name: E-Debian Lite
short_description:
This is a lighter version of E-Debian GNU/Linux. This version is better low resource systems for example old laptops,netbooks,and old desktops.

Debian 7.7 32-bit 3.2.0-4-486

LightDM is the session manager,so there is no auto-login in the live session. 
This version includes IceWM,LXDE,XFCE as window managers. IceWM is the lightest.


Login for Live Session:

username: live
password: live

This version does not include VirtualBox nor GIMP

Comes with Play On Linux; a front-end GUI for Wine so that users can install some Windows programs on GNU/Linux. You can find it in the games section 
Based on Debian 7. 

To install the operation system go to "System Tools" in the menu and select "Live Install" and follow the on-screen windows instructions.

To update packages type the following in the Terminal:

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade

To upgrade distribution:

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
